Deconvolution¶

Cell fraction deconvolution by DeSide or Scaden.

deside.decon_cf.dnn_evaluation(model_name, true_cell_fraction_file_path, result_dir_prediction, model_dir, result_dir, bulk_exp_file_path: str, test_set_name: str, replace=False, font_scale=1.5)¶

Model performance evaluation for test set

Parameters

  • model_name – model name

  • true_cell_fraction_file_path – file path of true (ground truth) cell fraction

  • result_dir_prediction – result directory contains the file of predicted cell fraction by DNN model

  • model_dir – pre-trained DNN model

  • result_dir – where to save the results

  • bulk_exp_file_path – the file path of bulk cell, log2(CPM + 1), sample by gene

  • test_set_name – the name of Test set, mark x / y label when plotting

  • replace – if replace previous result

  • font_scale – scale font size

Returns

deside.decon_cf.dnn_prediction(model_name, model_dir, cancer_type, bulk_exp_fp, result_dir, exp_type='TPM')¶

Predict cell fractions of each cell type by pre-trained DNN model, single model and single cancer type

Parameters

  • model_name – DeSide or Scaden

  • model_dir – model directory of pre-trained DNN model

  • cancer_type – cancer type for naming

  • bulk_exp_fp – file path of bulk expression profile file for corresponding cancer_type, gene by sample

  • result_dir – where to save the predicted results

  • exp_type – TPM (transcript per million) or log2tpm1p, log2(TPM + 1)

Returns

deside.decon_cf.dnn_training(model_name, h5ad_file_path, result_dir)¶

Training DNN model by DeSide or Scaden

Parameters

  • model_name – DeSide or Scaden

  • h5ad_file_path – file path of simulated bulk expression profiles saved in .h5ad file

  • result_dir – where to save model after training

Returns

Simulation Plot
